message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.CV, cs.SI. 

The paper proposes a method for certifiable robustness and robust training for Graph Convolutional Networks (GNNs) with respect to perturbations of node attributes. This work is related to machine learning and specifically focuses on GNNs, which are commonly used in tasks such as node classification and link prediction. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also discusses the use of GNNs in image classification tasks, which suggests a possible connection to cs.CV (Computer Vision). Finally, the paper proposes a semi-supervised training procedure, which could be relevant to cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
